name: Changuerías or City of Grackles
description:
Kristina M. Canales (she/they) is a reader, writer, educator, zinester, and resident weirdo Aquarian. They live with her sister, dog and cat. You can find them on Instagram.

Yadira Comulada (she/her) is a translator and editor from Puerto Rico, currently living on the island with her majestic cats and surrounded by books. You can find her on LinkedIn or Instagram.
